trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around September 21st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is much the same as my other descriptions which I have posted here--small pin point tiny flashing lights which move quickly and erratically followed by two points meeting up and a large orange ball of light--flash and a loud sound (kindof like a jet taking off)--We are located in a subdivision near the intersection of Hwy 26 and I-65. I believe my last report was in may--however I believe the one before was around this time of year.
Summary: Seems to happen this time every year
